subject: Order #SSN4647
description_text:
Hello just to be sure the two mouting braket was selected but not listed in the detail of the order. Can you confirm me please that the mounting braket for brake and throttle are included? Order is #SSN4647

Regards

Laurent Zeches
Von meinem iPhone gesendet

conversations.body_text: Hi Laurent Zeches,    These are included in your order, so no need to worry.
